backend/main.mo: Defines canister with category, worker, and inquiry types, authorization and approval logic, and in‑memory maps for stored entities.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated files, components, and test IDs for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten short summaries of numerous frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theming, i18n, and global layout for the React app.
frontend/src/components/admin/Categories: Admin UI for viewing, creating, editing, and deleting service categories using React Query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiriesA: Admin panel for viewing, filtering, updating, and deleting customer inquiries with status management and error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/WorkersAdm: Admin interface for managing workers, including approval, category updates, publishing, and linked inquiry completion.
frontend/src/components/alarms/PostCallA: Hosts and triggers the post-call alarm modal based on alarm state from usePostCallAlarm.
Modal that plays an alarm sound and blocks dismissal except via an OK button to remind workers of a service visit.
frontend/src/components/alarms/useAlarmS: Hook that plays a short alarm sound when triggered and handles autoplay failures and cleanup.
frontend/src/components/auth/InternetIde: Displays a detailed error notice for Internet Identity login failures with troubleshooting tips and retry support.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication, error states, logging diagnostics, and retries.
frontend/src/components/Brand.tsx: Small component rendering the SevaSangam brand text in three languages.
frontend/src/components/categories/Categ: Renders a grid of service categories linking to their respective pages with images and names.
frontend/src/components/errors/Connectio: Shows a connection error alert with suggested fixes and a retry button.
frontend/src/components/guards/RequireAd: Route guard that checks admin authentication and redirects or shows loading/error states accordingly.
frontend/src/components/guards/RequireAu: Route guard enforcing user authentication with Internet Identity and handles login errors and retries.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Application layout wrapper providing header, footer, and main content structure.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer component displaying localized copyright text.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive header with navigation links, language selector, and auth-based actions for workers and admins.
frontend/src/components/search/HomeSearc: Search panel for selecting category, location, and availability, then navigating to filtered search results.
frontend/src/components/workers/PhotoPic: Image upload component that previews selected photos, converts them to ExternalBlob, and allows removal.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerCa: Displays a worker’s basic info with photo, experience, location, and a link to view their profile.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerCo: Provides call and WhatsApp action buttons for contacting a worker and triggers call tracking.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerJo: Lists worker job inquiries with status indicators and details, or shows an empty state if none exist.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerPr: Form for editing a worker profile including personal info, photo, availability, and pricing before resubmission.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerRe: Form for new worker registration collecting personal, category, availability, and pricing info, then submitting a WorkerProfile.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and refreshes a backend actor based on Internet Identity, initializing admin access when available and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages admin login state using actor credential validation and session storage with helpers for login, logout, and credential retrieval.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Combines Internet Identity and admin session state to expose worker and admin authentication flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useI18n.ts: Simple hook exposing the I18n context for translation use.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling AuthClient setup, login, state restoration, and identity status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/usePostCallAlarm.ts: Tracks a call marker in session storage and triggers a one‑time post‑call alarm if conditions are met.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, categories, and admin-protected mutations, integrating actor state and admin session handling.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: I18n provider storing language preference in localStorage and offering translation utilities via context.
frontend/src/i18n/index.ts: Implements translation lookup, nested key resolution, pluralization, and template interpolation for supported languages.
frontend/src/i18n/locales/as.ts: Provides Assamese translation strings for UI components, pages, and common labels.
frontend/src/i18n/locales/en.ts: English translation file containing UI text for common labels, pages, and components.
frontend/src/i18n/locales/hi.ts: Hindi translation file providing localized UI text for common labels, pages, and components.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom CSS variables, dark mode values, and hero image glow animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page with tabs for managing workers, categories, and inquiries, wrapped in an admin guard.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Admin login form handling authentication, loading states, and redirects based on session status.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesIndexPage.t: Page showing a list of service categories using a category card grid.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Category detail page that fetches workers by category and displays loading, error, empty, or worker list states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero content, search panel, and category grid using i18n and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/SearchResultsPage.tsx: Fetches workers and filters them by category, location, and availability, handling loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/WorkerDashboardPage.t: Displays and manages the worker dashboard with profile editing, job list retrieval, and connection error handling.
Handles worker onboarding flow including login, profile setup, registration, and network error recovery.
frontend/src/pages/WorkerProfilePage.tsx: Shows a worker’s public profile with photo, experience, location, availability, pricing, and contact actions.
frontend/src/utils/adminApiErrorHandling: Provides utility functions to detect admin API errors, clear sessions, and generate user-facing error messages.
frontend/src/utils/adminSessionStorage.t: Implements admin session persistence using sessionStorage with helpers to save, load, clear, and check session status.
frontend/src/utils/authDiagnostics.ts: Logs structured, safe diagnostic events for Internet Identity authentication, including attempts, successes, and failures.
frontend/src/utils/categories.ts: Defines category IDs, display names, and functions mapping categories to icon indices and image paths.
frontend/src/utils/contactLinks.ts: Provides helpers to normalize phone numbers and generate tel/WhatsApp links.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Implements utilities to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL and session parameters, including hash-based parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin usage for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores project state, known issues, and feature requests related to worker dashboard simplification and admin job completion actions.
